channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia's earnings cleared our lofty bar. Here’s our new price target on the AI chip king
item.description: Don't be fooled by the sellers: Nvidia's future is as healthy as ever.

item.title: Palo Alto Networks beat and raise fails to wow Wall Street. But that plays into our hand
item.description: Don't sweat the drop in Palo Alto Networks stock.

item.title: Europe's Gas Price at Highest Levels as Geopolitical Risks Threaten Supplies
item.description: European natural-gas prices were at their highest level of the year, boosted by growing geopolitical risks and higher demand, with market concerns dri...

item.title: Nvidia's Coming Year Will Be a Turbulent One
item.description: The AI titan will maintain its strong lead, but complicated product rollouts, sky-high expectations and the China threat add complications to growth p...

item.title: Snowflake shares pop 19% on earnings and revenue beat
item.description: Snowflake reported better-than-expected results on the top and bottom lines.

item.title: South African Rand Falls as Rate Cut Expected
item.description: The rand fell ahead of the South African Reserve Bank’s policy decision later as most economists expect the central bank will cut interest rates by 25...

item.title: MicroStrategy's Magical Bitcoin Buying Machine Uses Some Wacky Math
item.description: Citing “yield” as a performance measure is likely to confuse some investors already overpaying for its stock.

item.title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
item.description: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

item.title: Target shares plunge 21% after discounter cuts forecast, posts biggest earnings miss in two years
item.description: Target missed on earnings and revenue even as it cut prices on thousands of items, including milk, diapers and toys, to try to attract discerning shop...

item.title: The Trump Stock Euphoria Starts to Fade
item.description: Tariffs, deficits and stretched valuations give Wall Street pause.
